3cb044dc-797f-397d-b726-340c46246525.name: Avro Writer - HWX SR Registry - HWX Content Encode

flow.description: Trucking NiFi app consuming from streaming trucking sensors, normalizing and enriching the streams and publishing data to downstream Kafka topics.
flow.name: IOT Trucking Data Flow

labels.label: Ingest Data Streams from Kafka Gateway Topics

Send normalized enriched data to downstream Kafka "Syndication" Topics.
 
Use Schema Registry to serialize from CSV into Avro before sending 
to Kafka by fetching  Schema associated with Kafka topic 
from  Schema Registry.

Parse, Route, Transform, Enrich the Data.
 
Use Schema Registry to project schema make transformations easier

processGroups.name: Publish Enriched Streams Kafka Syndication Services

source.name: US Central Truck Fleet - Kafka Gateway
US West Truck Fleet - Kafka Gateway
US East Truck Fleet - Kafka Gateway

labels.label:
Upstream app is sending CSV events with schema name in Kafka Message Header.
 
Use ConsumeKafkaRecord do the following
1. Grab the schema name from Kafka Header and store in Attribute called schema.name
2. Use the schema name to look up the Schema in HWX SR
3. Use the schema from HWX SR to convert to ProcessRecords
4. Route events by event source (speed or geo) using SQL

processGroups.name: Acquire Events from Kafka IOT Gateways
